Detailed Description

Dimension of a neuron model table.

This class abstract the behaviour of a neuron model table dimension. Each table is composed of different dimensions (time, membrane potential...).

Author:
Jesus Garrido

Richard Carrillo

Date:
August 2008

int NeuronModelTable::TableDimension::interp

Interpolation method of the dimension. 0: table_access_direct (interpolation is not used) 1: interp bilinear 2: interp linear 3: interp linear_ex 4: interp linear from 2 different positions 5: interp linear form n different positions
